Adaptation Technology.name: Adaptation Technology
Adaptation Technology.description: Global requirements Effect: Your global requirements are +2 or -2 steps, your choice in each case.

Advanced Ecosystems.name: Advanced Ecosystems
Advanced Ecosystems.requirements: 1 Plant tag / 1 Animal tag / 1 Microbe tag
Advanced Ecosystems.description: Requires a plant tag, a microbe tag, and an animal tag.

Aerobraked Ammonia Asteroid.name: Aerobraked Ammonia Asteroid
Aerobraked Ammonia Asteroid.description: Increase your heat production 3 steps and your plant production 1 step. Add 2 microbes to ANOTHER card.

Aquifer Pumping.name: Aquifer Pumping
Aquifer Pumping.description: megacredits Action: Spend 8 M€ to place 1 ocean tile. STEEL MAY BE USED as if you were playing a building card.

Algae.name: Algae
Algae.description: Requires 5 ocean tiles. Gain 1 plant and increase your plant production 2 steps.

ArchaeBacteria.name: ArchaeBacteria
ArchaeBacteria.description: It must be -18 C or colder. Increase your plant production 1 step.

Arctic Algae.name: Arctic Algae
Arctic Algae.description: It must be -12 C or colder to play. Gain 1 plant.

Artificial Lake.name: Artificial Lake
Artificial Lake.description: Requires -6 C or warmer. Place 1 ocean tile ON AN AREA NOT RESERVED FOR OCEAN.

Artificial Photosynthesis.name: Artificial Photosynthesis
Artificial Photosynthesis.description: Increase your plant production 1 step or your energy production 2 steps.

Asteroid.name: Asteroid
Asteroid.description: Raise temperature 1 step and gain 2 titanium. Remove up to 3 plants from any player.

Beam From A Thorium Asteroid.name: Beam From A Thorium Asteroid
Beam From A Thorium Asteroid.description: Requires a Jovian tag. Increase your heat production and energy production 3 steps each.

Big Asteroid.name: Big Asteroid
Big Asteroid.description: Raise temperature 2 steps and gain 4 titanium. Remove up to 4 plants from any player.

Biomass Combustors.name: Biomass Combustors
Biomass Combustors.description: Requires 6% oxygen. Decrease any plant production 1 step and increase your energy production 2 steps.

Birds.name: Birds
Birds.description: Requires 13% oxygen. Decrease any plant production 2 steps. 1 VP per animal on this card.

Black Polar Dust.name: Black Polar Dust
Black Polar Dust.description: Place an ocean tile. Decrease your M€ production 2 steps and increase your heat production 3 steps.

Bushes.name: Bushes
Bushes.description: Requires -10 C or warmer. Increase your plant production 2 steps. Gain 2 plants.

description.text: Requires 4 ocean tiles. Place this tile. Decrease your energy production 2 steps and increase your M€ production 5 steps.

Carbonate Processing.name: Carbonate Processing
Carbonate Processing.description: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your heat production 3 steps.

Cloud Seeding.name: Cloud Seeding
Cloud Seeding.description: Requires 3 ocean tiles. Decrease your M€ production 1 step and any heat production 1 step. Increase your plant production 2 steps.

Comet.name: Comet
Comet.description: Raise temperature 1 step and place an ocean tile. Remove up to 3 plants from any player.

Convoy From Europa.name: Convoy From Europa
Convoy From Europa.description: Place 1 ocean tile and draw 1 card.

Cupola City.name: Cupola City
Cupola City.description: Oxygen must be 9% or less. Place a city tile. Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your M€ production 3 steps.

Deep Well Heating.name: Deep Well Heating
Deep Well Heating.description: Increase your energy production 1 step. Increase temperature 1 step.

Deimos Down.name: Deimos Down
Deimos Down.description: Raise temperature 3 steps and gain 4 steel. Remove up to 8 plants from any player.

Designed Microorganisms.name: Designed Microorganisms
Designed Microorganisms.description: It must be -14 C or colder. Increase your plant production 2 steps.

description.text: Oxygen must be 7% or less. Gain 3 plants. Place a city tile. Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your M€ production 3 steps.
Requires that YOU have a greenery tile. Place this tile adjacent to ANY greenery.

Energy Saving.name: Energy Saving
Energy Saving.description: Increase your energy production 1 step for each city tile in play.

Eos Chasma National Park.name: Eos Chasma National Park
Eos Chasma National Park.description: Requires -12 C or warmer. Add 1 animal TO ANY ANIMAL CARD. Gain 3 plants. Increase your M€ production 2 steps.

Equatorial Magnetizer.name: Equatorial Magnetizer
Equatorial Magnetizer.description: production-box Action: Decrease your energy production 1 step to increase your terraform rating 1 step.

Extreme-Cold Fungus.name: Extreme-Cold Fungus
Extreme-Cold Fungus.description: It must be -10 C or colder.

Farming.name: Farming
Farming.description: Requires +4° C or warmer. Increase your M€ production 2 steps and your plant production 2 steps. Gain 2 plants.

description.text: Requires +2 C° or warmer. Decrease any plant production 1 step.

Flooding.name: Flooding
Flooding.description: Place an ocean tile. IF THERE ARE TILES ADJACENT TO THIS OCEAN TILE, YOU MAY REMOVE 4 M€ FROM THE OWNER OF ONE OF THOSE TILES.

Food Factory.name: Food Factory
Food Factory.description: Decrease your plant production 1 step and increase your M€ production 4 steps.

Fusion Power.name: Fusion Power
Fusion Power.description: Requires 2 power tags. Increase your energy production 3 steps.

Fueled Generators.name: Fueled Generators
Fueled Generators.description: Decrease your M€ production 1 step and increase your energy production 1 steps.

Ganymede Colony.name: Ganymede Colony
Ganymede Colony.description: Place a city tile ON THE RESERVED AREA.

GHG Factories.name: GHG Factories
GHG Factories.description: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your heat production 4 steps.

Giant Ice Asteroid.name: Giant Ice Asteroid
Giant Ice Asteroid.description: Raise temperature 2 steps and place 2 ocean tiles. Remove up to 6 plants from any player.

Grass.name: Grass
Grass.description: Requires -16° C or warmer. Increase your plant production 1 step. Gain 3 plants.

Great Dam.name: Great Dam
Great Dam.description: Requires 4 ocean tiles. Increase your energy production 2 steps.

Greenhouses.name: Greenhouses
Greenhouses.description: Gain 1 plant for each city tile in play.

Heather.name: Heather
Heather.description: Requires -14 C° or warmer. Increase your plant production 1 step. Gain 1 plant.

Heat Trappers.name: Heat Trappers
Heat Trappers.description: Decrease any heat production 2 steps and increase your energy production 1 step.

description.text: Requires 8% oxygen. +1 animal to this card. -1 any plant production

Ice Cap Melting.name: Ice Cap Melting
Ice Cap Melting.description: Requires +2 C or warmer. Place 1 ocean tile.

Immigrant City.name: Immigrant City
Immigrant City.description: Decrease your energy production 1 step and decrease your M€ production 2 steps. Place a city tile.

Imported GHG.name: Imported GHG
Imported GHG.description: Increase your heat production 1 step and gain 3 heat.

Imported Hydrogen.name: Imported Hydrogen
Imported Hydrogen.description: Gain 3 plants, or add 3 microbes or 2 animals to ANOTHER card. Place an ocean tile.

Imported Nitrogen.name: Imported Nitrogen
Imported Nitrogen.description: Raise your TR 1 step and gain 4 plants. Add 3 microbes to ANOTHER card and 2 animals to ANOTHER card.

Industrial Microbes.name: Industrial Microbes
Industrial Microbes.description: Increase your energy production and your steel production 1 step each.

Insects.name: Insects
Insects.description: Requires 6% oxygen. Increase your plant production 1 step for each plant tag you have.

Insulation.name: Insulation
Insulation.description: Decrease your heat production any number of steps and increase your M€ production the same number of steps.

Ironworks.name: Ironworks
Ironworks.description: Action: Spend 4 energy to gain 1 steel and raise oxygen 1 step.

Kelp Farming.name: Kelp Farming
Kelp Farming.description: Requires 6 ocean tiles. Increase your M€ production 2 steps and your plant production 3 steps. Gain 2 plants.

Lake Marineris.name: Lake Marineris
Lake Marineris.description: Requires 0° C or warmer. Place 2 ocean tiles.

Large Convoy.name: Large Convoy
Large Convoy.description: Place an ocean tile and draw 2 cards. Gain 5 plants or add 4 animals to ANOTHER card.

Lava Flows.name: Lava Flows
Lava Flows.description: Raise temperature 2 steps and place this tile ON EITHER THARSIS THOLUS, ASCRAEUS MONS, PAVONIS MONS OR ARSIA MONS.

Lichen.name: Lichen
Lichen.description: Requires -24 C or warmer. Increase your plant production 1 step.

description.text: Requires 9% oxygen. Decrease your plant production 1 step and increase your M€ production 2 steps

Local Heat Trapping.name: Local Heat Trapping
Local Heat Trapping.description: Spend 5 heat to gain either 4 plants, or to add 2 animals to ANOTHER card.

Lunar Beam.name: Lunar Beam
Lunar Beam.description: Decrease your M€ production 2 steps and increase your heat production and energy production 2 steps each.

Magnetic Field Dome.name: Magnetic Field Dome
Magnetic Field Dome.description: Decrease your energy production 2 steps and increase your plant production 1 step. Raise your TR 1 step.

Magnetic Field Generators.name: Magnetic Field Generators
Magnetic Field Generators.description: Decrease your energy production 4 steps and increase your plant production 2 steps. Raise your TR 3 steps.

Mangrove.name: Mangrove
Mangrove.description: Requires +4 C or warmer. Place a greenery tile ON AN AREA RESERVED FOR OCEAN and raise oxygen 1 step. Disregard normal placement restrictions for this.

Martian Rails.name: Martian Rails
Martian Rails.description: megacredits Action: Spend 1 energy to gain 1 M€ for each city tile ON MARS.

Methane From Titan.name: Methane From Titan
Methane From Titan.description: Requires 2% oxygen. Increase your heat production 2 steps and your plant production 2 steps.

Mining Expedition.name: Mining Expedition
Mining Expedition.description: Raise oxygen 1 step. Remove 2 plants from any player. Gain 2 steel.

Mining Rights.name: Mining Rights
Mining Rights.description: Place this tile on an area with a steel or titanium placement bonus. Increase that production 1 step.

Mohole Area.name: Mohole Area
Mohole Area.description: Increase your heat production 4 steps. Place this tile ON AN AREA RESERVED FOR OCEAN.

Moss.name: Moss
Moss.description: Requires 3 ocean tiles and that you lose 1 plant. Increase your plant production 1 step.

Natural Preserve.name: Natural Preserve
Natural Preserve.description: Oxygen must be 4% or less. Place this tile NEXT TO NO OTHER TILE. Increase your M€ production 1 step.

Nitrogen-Rich Asteroid.name: Nitrogen-Rich Asteroid
Nitrogen-Rich Asteroid.description: Raise your terraforming rating 2 steps and temperature 1 step. Increase your plant production 1 step, or 4 steps if you have 3 plant tags.

Nitrophilic Moss.name: Nitrophilic Moss
Nitrophilic Moss.description: Requires 3 ocean tiles and that you lose 2 plants. Increase your plant production 2 steps.

Noctis City.name: Noctis City
Noctis City.description: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your M€ production 3 steps. Place a city tile ON THE RESERVED AREA, disregarding normal placement restrictions.

Noctis Farming.name: Noctis Farming
Noctis Farming.description: Requires -20 C or warmer. Increase your M€ production 1 step and gain 2 plants.

Nuclear Power.name: Nuclear Power
Nuclear Power.description: Decrease your M€ production 2 steps and increase your energy production 3 steps.

Nuclear Zone.name: Nuclear Zone
Nuclear Zone.description: Place this tile and raise temperature 2 steps.

description.text: Requires 12% oxygen. Gain 2 plants. Place a city tile. Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your M€ production 4 steps.

Optimal Aerobraking.name: Optimal Aerobraking
Optimal Aerobraking.description: megacredits Effect: When you play a space event, you gain 3 M€ and 3 heat.

Ore Processor.name: Ore Processor
Ore Processor.description: Action: Spend 4 energy to gain 1 titanium and increase oxygen 1 step.

Permafrost Extraction.name: Permafrost Extraction
Permafrost Extraction.description: Requires -8 C or warmer. Place 1 ocean tile.

Peroxide Power.name: Peroxide Power
Peroxide Power.description: Decrease your M€ production 1 step and increase your energy production 2 steps.

description.text: Add 1 animal to this card.

Phobos Space Haven.name: Phobos Space Haven
Phobos Space Haven.description: Increase your titanium production 1 step and place a city tile ON THE RESERVED AREA.

Plantation.name: Plantation
Plantation.description: Requires 2 science tags. Place a greenery tile and raise oxygen 1 step.

Power Grid.name: Power Grid
Power Grid.description: Increase your energy production step for each power tag you have, including this.

Protected Valley.name: Protected Valley
Protected Valley.description: Increase your M€ production 2 steps. Place a greenery tile ON AN AREA RESERVED FOR OCEAN, disregarding normal placement restrictions, and increase oxygen 1 step.

Rad-Chem Factory.name: Rad-Chem Factory
Rad-Chem Factory.description: Decrease your energy production 1 step. Raise your TR 2 steps.

Regolith Eaters.name: Regolith Eaters
Regolith Eaters.description: Action: Add 1 microbe to this card. Action: Remove 2 microbes from this card to raise oxygen level 1 step.

Research Outpost.name: Research Outpost
Research Outpost.description: Place a city tile NEXT TO NO OTHER TILE.

Rover Construction.name: Rover Construction
Rover Construction.description: megacredits Effect: When any city tile is placed, gain 2 M€.

description.text: Requires 5% oxygen. Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your M€ production 2 steps.
Requires 6% oxygen. Decrease any plant production 1 step.

Soil Factory.name: Soil Factory
Soil Factory.description: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your plant production 1 step.

Solar Wind Power.name: Solar Wind Power
Solar Wind Power.description: Increase your energy production 1 step and gain 2 titanium.

Space Mirrors.name: Space Mirrors
Space Mirrors.description: megacredits production-box Action: Spend 7 M€ to increase your energy production 1 step.

Special Design.name: Special Design
Special Design.description: The next card you play this generation is +2 or -2 steps in global requirements, your choice.

Steelworks.name: Steelworks
Steelworks.description: Action: Spend 4 energy to gain 2 steel and increase oxygen 1 step.

Strip Mine.name: Strip Mine
Strip Mine.description: Decrease your energy production 2 steps. Increase your steel production 2 steps and your titanium production 1 step. Raise oxygen 2 steps.

Tectonic Stress Power.name: Tectonic Stress Power
Tectonic Stress Power.description: Requires 2 science tags. Increase your energy production 3 steps.

Towing A Comet.name: Towing A Comet
Towing A Comet.description: Gain 2 plants. Raise oxygen level 1 step and place an ocean tile.

Trees.name: Trees
Trees.description: Requires -4 C or warmer. Increase your plant production 3 steps. Gain 1 plant.

Tundra Farming.name: Tundra Farming
Tundra Farming.description: Requires -6° C or warmer. Increase your plant production 1 step and your M€ production 2 steps. Gain 1 plant.

Underground City.name: Underground City
Underground City.description: Place a city tile. Decrease your energy production 2 steps and increase your steel production 2 steps.

Underground Detonations.name: Underground Detonations
Underground Detonations.description: megacredits production-box Action: Spend 10M€ to increase your heat production 2 steps.

Urbanized Area.name: Urbanized Area
Urbanized Area.description: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your M€ production 2 steps. Place a city tile ADJACENT TO AT LEAST 2 OTHER CITY TILES.

Water Import From Europa.name: Water Import From Europa
Water Import From Europa.description: megacredits Action: Pay 12 M€ to place an ocean tile. TITANIUM MAY BE USED as if playing a space card. 1 VP for each Jovian tag you have.

Wave Power.name: Wave Power
Wave Power.description: Requires 3 ocean tiles. Increase your energy production 1 step.

Windmills.name: Windmills
Windmills.description: Requires 7% oxygen. Increase your energy production 1 step.

Worms.name: Worms
Worms.description: Requires 4% oxygen. Increase your plant production 1 step for every 2 microbe tags you have, including this.

Zeppelins.name: Zeppelins
Zeppelins.description: Requires 5% oxygen. Increase your M€ production 1 step for each city tile ON MARS.

Beginner Corporation.name: Beginner Corporation
Beginner Corporation.description: You start with 42 M€. Instead of choosing from 10 cards during setup, you get 10 cards for free.

EcoLine.name: EcoLine
EcoLine.description: You start with 2 plant production, 3 plants, and 36 M€.

Helion.name: Helion
Helion.description: You start with 3 heat production and 42 M€.

Interplanetary Cinematics.name: Interplanetary Cinematics
Interplanetary Cinematics.description: You start with 20 steel and 30 M€.

Inventrix.name: Inventrix
Inventrix.description: As your first action in the game, draw 3 cards. Start with 45 M€.

Mining Guild.name: Mining Guild
Mining Guild.description: You start with 30 M€, 5 steel and 1 steel production.

PhoboLog.name: PhoboLog
PhoboLog.description: You start with 10 titanium and 23 M€.

Tharsis Republic.name: Tharsis Republic
Tharsis Republic.description: You start with 40 M€. As your first action in the game, place a city tile.

Thorgate.name: Thorgate
Thorgate.description: You start with 1 energy production and 48 M€.

Advanced Alloys.name: Advanced Alloys
Advanced Alloys.description: megacredits Effect: Each titanium you have is worth 1 M€ extra. megacredits Effect: Each steel you have is worth 1 M€ extra.

description.text: Requires 3 science tags to play. Decrease your energy production 1 step.

Asteroid Mining Consortium.name: Asteroid Mining Consortium
Asteroid Mining Consortium.description: Requires that you have titanium production. Decrease any titanium production 1 step and increase your own 1 step.

Building Industries.name: Building Industries
Building Industries.description: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your steel production 2 steps.

Business Contacts.name: Business Contacts
Business Contacts.description: Look at the top 4 cards from the deck. Take 2 of them into hand and discard the other 2.

Cartel.name: Cartel
Cartel.description: Increase your M€ production 1 step for each Earth tag you have, including this.

CEO's Favorite Project.name: CEO's Favorite Project
CEO's Favorite Project.description: Add 1 resource to a card with at least 1 resource on it

Commercial District.name: Commercial District
Commercial District.description: Place this tile. Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your M€ production 4 steps.

Corporate Stronghold.name: Corporate Stronghold
Corporate Stronghold.description: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your M€ production 3 steps. Place a city tile.

Development Center.name: Development Center
Development Center.description: Action: Spend 1 energy to draw a card.

Earth Catapult.name: Earth Catapult
Earth Catapult.description: megacredits Effect: When you play a card, you pay 2 M€ less for it.

Earth Office.name: Earth Office
Earth Office.description: megacredits Effect: When you play an Earth tag, you pay 3 M€ less for it.

description.text: Oxygen must be 8% or less. Decrease your energy production 1 step.

Energy Tapping.name: Energy Tapping
Energy Tapping.description: Decrease any energy production 1 step and increase your own 1 step.

Fuel Factory.name: Fuel Factory
Fuel Factory.description: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your titanium and your M€ production 1 step each.

Gene Repair.name: Gene Repair
Gene Repair.description: Requires 3 science tags. Increase your M€ production 2 steps.

Great Escarpment Consortium.name: Great Escarpment Consortium
Great Escarpment Consortium.description: Requires that you have steel production. Decrease any steel production 1 step and increase your own 1 step.

Hackers.name: Hackers
Hackers.description: Decrease your energy production 1 step and any M€ production 2 steps. Increase your M€ production 2 steps.

Hired Raiders.name: Hired Raiders
Hired Raiders.description: Steal up to 2 steel, or 3 M€ from any player.

Indentured Workers.name: Indentured Workers
Indentured Workers.description: The next card you play this generation costs 8 M€ less.

Industrial Center.name: Industrial Center
Industrial Center.description: Place this tile adjacent to a city tile.

Interstellar Colony Ship.name: Interstellar Colony Ship
Interstellar Colony Ship.description: Requires that you have 5 science tags.

Invention Contest.name: Invention Contest
Invention Contest.description: Look at the top 3 cards from the deck. Take 1 of them into hand and discard the other two

Inventors' Guild.name: Inventors' Guild
Inventors' Guild.description: Action: Look at the top card and either buy it or discard it

Investment Loan.name: Investment Loan
Investment Loan.description: Decrease your M€ production 1 step. Gain 10 M€.

Io Mining Industries.name: Io Mining Industries
Io Mining Industries.description: Increase your titanium production 2 steps and your M€ production 2 steps.

Land Claim.name: Land Claim
Land Claim.description: Place your marker on a non-reserved area. Only you may place a tile there.

Lightning Harvest.name: Lightning Harvest
Lightning Harvest.description: Requires 3 science tags. Increase your energy production and your M€ production one step each.

Mars University.name: Mars University
Mars University.description: Effect: When you play a science tag, including this, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.

Mass Converter.name: Mass Converter
Mass Converter.description: Requires 5 science tags. Increase your energy production 6 steps.

Media Archives.name: Media Archives
Media Archives.description: Gain 1 M€ for each event EVER PLAYED by all players.

Media Group.name: Media Group
Media Group.description: megacredits Effect: After you play an event card, you gain 3 M€.

Medical Lab.name: Medical Lab
Medical Lab.description: Increase your M€ production 1 step for every 2 building tags you have, including this.

Mining Area.name: Mining Area
Mining Area.description: Place this tile on an area with a steel or titanium placement bonus, adjacent to another of your tiles. Increase your production of that resource 1 step.

Miranda Resort.name: Miranda Resort
Miranda Resort.description: Increase your M€ production 1 step for each Earth tag you have.

Olympus Conference.name: Olympus Conference
Olympus Conference.description: When you play a science tag, including this, either add a science resource to this card, or remove a science resource from this card to draw a card.

Physics Complex.name: Physics Complex
Physics Complex.description: Action: Spend 6 energy to add a science resource to this card. 2 VP for each science resource on this card.

Power Infrastructure.name: Power Infrastructure
Power Infrastructure.description: megacredits Action: Spend any amount of energy and gain that amount of M€.

Power Supply Consortium.name: Power Supply Consortium
Power Supply Consortium.description: Requires 2 power tags. Decrease any energy production 1 step and increase your own 1 step.

Quantum Extractor.name: Quantum Extractor
Quantum Extractor.description: Requires 4 science tags. Increase your energy production 4 steps.

Rad-Suits.name: Rad-Suits
Rad-Suits.description: Requires two cities in play. Increase your M€ production 1 step.

Research.name: Research
Research.description: Counts as playing 2 science cards. Draw 2 cards.

Robotic Workforce.name: Robotic Workforce
Robotic Workforce.description: Duplicate only the production box of one of your building cards.

Sabotage.name: Sabotage
Sabotage.description: Remove up to 3 titanium from any player, or 4 steel, or 7 M€.

Satellites.name: Satellites
Satellites.description: Increase your M€ production 1 step for each space tag you have, including this one.

Security Fleet.name: Security Fleet
Security Fleet.description: Action: Spend 1 titanium to add 1 fighter resource to this card. 1 VP for each fighter resource on this card.

Space Station.name: Space Station
Space Station.description: megacredits Effect: When you play a space card, you pay 2 M€ less for it.

Standard Technology.name: Standard Technology
Standard Technology.description: Standard projects megacredits Effect: After you pay for a standard project, except selling patents, you gain 3 M€.

Tardigrades.name: Tardigrades
Tardigrades.description: Action: Add 1 microbe to this card. 1 VP per 4 Microbes on this card.

Terraforming Ganymede.name: Terraforming Ganymede
Terraforming Ganymede.description: Raise your TR 1 step for each Jovian tag you have, including this.

Toll Station.name: Toll Station
Toll Station.description: Increase your M€ production 1 step for each space tag your OPPONENTS have.

Tropical Resort.name: Tropical Resort
Tropical Resort.description: Reduce your heat production 2 steps and increase your M€ production 3 steps.

Viral Enhancers.name: Viral Enhancers
Viral Enhancers.description: Effect: When you play a plant, microbe, or an animal tag, including this, gain 1 plant or add 1 resource to THAT CARD.

Virus.name: Virus
Virus.description: Remove up to 2 animals or 5 plants from any player.

Saturn Systems.name: Saturn Systems
Saturn Systems.description: You start with 1 titanium production and 42 M€.

Small Asteroid.name: Small Asteroid
Small Asteroid.description: Increase temperature 1 step. Remove up to 2 plants from any player.

Snow Algae.name: Snow Algae
Snow Algae.description: Requires 2 oceans. Increase your plant production and your heat production 1 step each.

Dusk Laser Mining.name: Dusk Laser Mining
Dusk Laser Mining.description: Requires 2 science tags. Decrease your energy production 1 step, and increase your titanium production 1 step. Gain 4 titanium.

Rego Plastics.name: Rego Plastics
Rego Plastics.description: megacredits Effect: Your steel resources are worth 1 M€ extra.

Interplanetary Trade.name: Interplanetary Trade
Interplanetary Trade.description: Increase your M€ production 1 step per different tag you have in play, including this.

Project Inspection.name: Project Inspection
Project Inspection.description: Use a card action that has been used this generation.

Hi-Tech Lab.name: Hi-Tech Lab
Hi-Tech Lab.description: Action: Spend any amount of energy to draw the same number of cards. TAKE 1 INTO HAND AND DISCARD THE REST.

Energy Market.name: Energy Market
Energy Market.description: megacredits Action: Spend 2X M€ to gain X energy. production-box megacredits Action: Decrease energy production 1 step to gain 8 M€.

Law Suit.name: Law Suit
Law Suit.description: Steal 3 M€ from a player that REMOVED YOUR RESOURCES OR DECREASED YOUR PRODUCTION this generation. Place this card face down in THAT PLAYER'S EVENT PILE.

Stanford Torus.name: Stanford Torus
Stanford Torus.description: Place a city tile IN SPACE, outside and separate from the planet.

Asteroid Hollowing.name: Asteroid Hollowing
Asteroid Hollowing.description: megacredits production-box Action: Spend 1 titanium to add 1 asteroid resource here and increase M€ production 1 step. 1 VP for each 2 asteroids on this card.

Comet Aiming.name: Comet Aiming
Comet Aiming.description: Action: Spend 1 titanium to add 1 asteroid resource to ANY CARD. Action: Remove 1 asteroid here to place an ocean.

Cutting Edge Technology.name: Cutting Edge Technology
Cutting Edge Technology.description: megacredits Effect: When playing a card with a requirement, you pay 2 M€ less for it.

Crash Site Cleanup.name: Crash Site Cleanup
Crash Site Cleanup.description: Requires that a player removed ANOTHER PLAYER's plants this generation. Gain 1 titanium or 2 steel.

Directed Impactors.name: Directed Impactors
Directed Impactors.description: megacredits Action: Spend 6 M€ to add 1 asteroid to ANY CARD (titanium may be used to pay for this). temperature Action: Remove 1 asteroid here to raise temperature 1 step.

Field-Capped City.name: Field-Capped City
Field-Capped City.description: Increase your M€ production 2 steps, increase your energy production 1 step, gain 3 plants, and place a city tile.

Magnetic Shield.name: Magnetic Shield
Magnetic Shield.description: Requires 3 power tags. Raise your TR 4 steps.

Meltworks.name: Meltworks
Meltworks.description: Action: Spend 5 heat to gain 3 steel.

Mohole Lake.name: Mohole Lake
Mohole Lake.description: Gain 3 plants. Raise temperature 1 step, and place 1 ocean tile.

Diversity Support.name: Diversity Support
Diversity Support.description: Requires that you have 9 different types of resources. Gain 1 TR.

Imported Nutrients.name: Imported Nutrients
Imported Nutrients.description: Gain 4 plants and add 4 microbes to ANOTHER CARD.

description.text: Decrease your energy production 1 step. 1 VP per asteroid on this card.

Potatoes.name: Potatoes
Potatoes.description: Lose 2 plants. Increase your M€ production 2 steps.

Meat Industry.name: Meat Industry
Meat Industry.description: megacredits Effect: When you gain an animal to ANY CARD, gain 2 M€.

Advertising.name: Advertising
Advertising.description: megacredits megacredits production-box Effect: When you play a card with a basic cost of 20 M€ or more, increase your M€ production 1 step.

Deimos Down:promo.name: Deimos Down:promo
Deimos Down:promo.description: Raise temperature 3 steps and gain 4 steel. Place this tile ADJACENT TO no city tile. Remove up to 6 plants from any player.

Great Dam:promo.name: Great Dam:promo
Great Dam:promo.description: Requires 4 ocean tiles. Increase your energy production 2 steps. Place this tile ADJACENT TO an ocean tile.

Magnetic Field Generators:promo.name: Magnetic Field Generators:promo
Magnetic Field Generators:promo.description: Decrease your energy production 4 steps and increase your plant production 2 steps. Raise your TR 3 steps. Place this tile.

Saturn Surfing.name: Saturn Surfing
Saturn Surfing.description: Add 1 floater here for every Earth tag you have, including this.

Bio Printing Facility.name: Bio Printing Facility
Bio Printing Facility.description: Action: Spend 2 energy to gain 2 plants OR to add 1 animal to ANOTHER card.

Bactoviral Research.name: Bactoviral Research
Bactoviral Research.description: Draw 1 card. Choose 1 of your played cards and add 1 microbe to it for each science tag you have, including this.

Harvest.name: Harvest
Harvest.description: Requires that you have 3 greenery tiles in play. Gain 12 M€.

Outdoor Sports.name: Outdoor Sports
Outdoor Sports.description: Requires any city adjacent to an ocean. Increase your M€ production 2 steps.

16 Psyche.name: 16 Psyche
16 Psyche.description: Increase titanium production 2 steps. Gain 3 titanium.

Robot Pollinators.name: Robot Pollinators
Robot Pollinators.description: Requires 4% oxygen. Increase your plant production 1 step. Gain 1 plant for every plant tag you have.

Floyd Continuum.name: Floyd Continuum
Floyd Continuum.description: megacredits temperature Action: Gain 3 M€ per completed terraforming parameter.

Aqueduct Systems.name: Aqueduct Systems
Aqueduct Systems.description: Requires you have a city next to an ocean. Draw 3 cards with a building tag.

Astra Mechanica.name: Astra Mechanica
Astra Mechanica.description: RETURN UP TO 2 OF YOUR PLAYED EVENT CARDS TO YOUR HAND. THEY MAY NOT BE CARDS THAT PLACE SPECIAL TILES.

St. Joseph of Cupertino Mission.name: St. Joseph of Cupertino Mission
St. Joseph of Cupertino Mission.description: 1 VP per City with a Cathedral in it.

Carbon Nanosystems.name: Carbon Nanosystems
Carbon Nanosystems.description: Effect: When you play a science tag, including this, add a graphene resource here. megacredits Effect: When playing a space or city tag, graphenes may be used as 4 M€ each.

Cyberia Systems.name: Cyberia Systems
Cyberia Systems.description: Increase your steel production 1 step. Copy the PRODUCTION BOXES of 2 of your cards with building tags.

Hermetic Order of Mars.name: Hermetic Order of Mars
Hermetic Order of Mars.description: Oxygen must be 4% or lower. Increase your M€ production 2 steps. Gain 1 M€ per empty area adjacent to your tiles.

Kaguya Tech.name: Kaguya Tech
Kaguya Tech.description: megacredits production-box Increase M€ production 2 steps. Draw 1 card. Remove 1 of your greenery tiles (does not affect oxygen.) Place a city tile there, regardless of placement rules. Gain placement bonuses as usual.

Mars Nomads.name: Mars Nomads
Mars Nomads.description: Action: MOVE THE NOMADS to an adjacent, non-reserved empty area and collect THE PLACEMENT BONUS as if placing a special tile there. No tiles may be placed on the Nomad area. PLACE THE NOMADS on a non-reserved, empty area on the game board.

Neptunian Power Consultants.name: Neptunian Power Consultants
Neptunian Power Consultants.description: 1 VP per hydroelectric resource on this card

Martian Lumber Corp.name: Martian Lumber Corp
Martian Lumber Corp.description: megacredits Effect: When playing a building tag, plants may be used as 3 M€ each. production-box (Requires that you have 2 greenery tiles. Increase plant production 1 step.)

Directed Heat Usage.name: Directed Heat Usage
Directed Heat Usage.description: megacredits Action: Spend 3 heat to gain either 4 M€ or 2 plants.

Icy Impactors.name: Icy Impactors
Icy Impactors.description: megacredits Action: Spend 10 M€ (titanium may be used) to add 2 asteroids here. Action: Spend 1 asteroid here to place an ocean tile. FIRST PLAYER CHOOSES WHERE YOU MUST PLACE IT.

Soil Enrichment.name: Soil Enrichment
Soil Enrichment.description: Spend 1 microbe from ANY of your cards to gain 5 plants

City Parks.name: City Parks
City Parks.description: Requires that you have 3 cities. Gain 2 plants.

Supermarkets.name: Supermarkets
Supermarkets.description: Requires two cities in play. Increase your M€ production 2 steps.

description.text: Decrease your energy production 1 step.

Casinos.name: Casinos
Casinos.description: Requires that you have a city. Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your M€ production 4 steps.

Protected Growth.name: Protected Growth
Protected Growth.description: Oxygen must be 7% or less. Gain 1 plant per power tag you have.

New Holland.name: New Holland
New Holland.description: Requires 4 city tiles ON MARS. Increase your M€ production 3 steps. Place a city tile on top of an already placed ocean tile, FOLLOWING NORMAL CITY PLACEMENT RESTRICTIONS. The tile counts as a city and an ocean.

Vermin.name: Vermin
Vermin.description: Each player, including you, gets -1 VP per city they have IF THERE ARE AT LEAST 10 ANIMALS HERE.

Public Plans.name: Public Plans
Public Plans.description: REVEAL ANY NUMBER OF OTHER CARDS FROM YOUR HAND. (YOUR OPPONENTS MAY INSPECT THEM.) GAIN 1 M€ FOR EACH REVEALED CARD.

Static Harvesting.name: Static Harvesting
Static Harvesting.description: Requires 3 or fewer ocean tiles. Increase your energy production 1 step. Gain 1 M€ per building tag you have.

Arcadian Communities.name: Arcadian Communities
Arcadian Communities.description: You start with 40 M€ and 10 steel. AS YOUR FIRST ACTION, PLACE A COMMUNITY [PLAYER MARKER] ON A NON-RESERVED AREA.

Astrodrill.name: Astrodrill
Astrodrill.description: You start with 35 M€ and 3 asteroid resources.

Factorum.name: Factorum
Factorum.description: You start with 37 M€. Increase your steel production 1 step.

Pharmacy Union.name: Pharmacy Union
Pharmacy Union.description: megacredits (You start with 54 M€. Draw a Science card.) megacredits Effect: When ANY microbe tag is played, add a disease here and lose 4 M€ or as much as possible. When you play a science tag, remove a disease here and gain 1 TR OR if there are no diseases here, you MAY put this card face down in your EVENTS PILE to gain 3 TR. corp-box-effect

Philares.name: Philares
Philares.description: You start with 47 M€. As your first action, place a greenery tile and raise the oxygen 1 step.

Mons Insurance.name: Mons Insurance
Mons Insurance.description: You start with 48 M€. Increase your M€ production 4 steps. ALL OPPONENTS DECREASE THEIR M€ production 2 STEPS. THIS DOES NOT TRIGGER THE EFFECT BELOW.

Recyclon.name: Recyclon
Recyclon.description: You start with 38 M€ and 1 steel production.

Splice.name: Splice
Splice.description: You start with 44 M€. As your first action, reveal cards until you have revealed a microbe tag. Take it and discard the rest.

Tycho Magnetics.name: Tycho Magnetics
Tycho Magnetics.description: You start with 42 M€. Increase your energy production 1 step.

Kuiper Cooperative.name: Kuiper Cooperative
Kuiper Cooperative.description: You start with 33 M€. Increase titanium production 1 step.

PolderTECH Dutch.name: PolderTECH Dutch
PolderTECH Dutch.description: You start with 35 M€. As your first action, place an ocean tile and a greenery tile next to each other IGNORING GREENERY PLACEMENT RESTRICTIONS. Raise oxygen 1 step.

New Partner.name: New Partner
New Partner.description: Raise your M€ production 1 step. Immediately draw 2 prelude cards. Play 1 of them, and discard the other.

Merger.name: Merger
Merger.description: Draw 4 corporation cards. Play one of them and discard the other 3. Then pay 42 M€.

Double Down.name: Double Down
Double Down.description: Copy your other prelude's direct effect.

Anti-desertification Techniques.name: Anti-desertification Techniques
Anti-desertification Techniques.description: Gain 3 M€. Increase your plant production 1 step and your steel production 1 step.

Giant Solar Collector.name: Giant Solar Collector
Giant Solar Collector.description: Increase your energy production 2 steps. Raise Venus 1 step.

Strategic Base Planning.name: Strategic Base Planning

Aerial Mappers.name: Aerial Mappers
Aerial Mappers.description: Action: Add floater to ANY card. Action: Spend one floater here to draw 1 card.

Aerosport Tournament.name: Aerosport Tournament
Aerosport Tournament.description: Requires that you have 5 floaters. Gain 1 M€ per each city tile in play.

Air-Scrapping Expedition.name: Air-Scrapping Expedition
Air-Scrapping Expedition.description: Raise Venus 1 step. Add 3 floaters to ANY Venus CARD.

Atmoscoop.name: Atmoscoop

Comet for Venus.name: Comet for Venus

Corroder Suits.name: Corroder Suits
Corroder Suits.description: Increase your M€ production 2 steps. Add 1 resource to ANY Venus CARD.

Dawn City.name: Dawn City

Deuterium Export.name: Deuterium Export

Dirigibles.name: Dirigibles
Dirigibles.description: Action: Add 1 floater to ANY card megacredits Effect: When playing a Venus tag, Floaters here may be used as payment, and are worth 3M€ each.

Forced Precipitation.name: Forced Precipitation
Forced Precipitation.description: megacredits Action: Spend 2 M€ to add 1 floater to THIS card. Action: Spend 2 floaters here to increase Venus 1 step.

description.text: Requires 10% on the Venus track. Add 2 microbes or 2 animals to another Venus card. Production: energy -1, M€ +2.

GHG Import From Venus.name: GHG Import From Venus

Gyropolis.name: Gyropolis

Hydrogen to Venus.name: Hydrogen to Venus

Local Shading.name: Local Shading

description.text: Requires Venus 12%. Decrease your energy production 1 step. Place a city tile ON THE RESERVED AREA.

Sister Planet Support.name: Sister Planet Support

Solarnet.name: Solarnet

Solarnet.description: Requires Venus, Earth and Jovian tags. Draw 2 cards.

Spin-Inducing Asteroid.name: Spin-Inducing Asteroid

description.text: Requires 2 science tags. Increase your M€ production 2 steps. Place a city tile ON THE RESERVED AREA
Requires Venus 12% and that you spend 1 floater from any card.

Sulphur Exports.name: Sulphur Exports

Venus Governor.name: Venus Governor

description.text: Requires Venus 16%. Raise Venus 1 step. Add 1 microbe or 1 animal to ANOTHER VENUS CARD

Aphrodite.name: Aphrodite
Aphrodite.description: You start with 1 plant production and 47 M€.

Morning Star Inc..name: Morning Star Inc.

Corona Extractor.name: Corona Extractor

Cryo-Sleep.name: Cryo-Sleep

Galilean Waystation.name: Galilean Waystation

description.text: Requires 1 Jovian tag. Increase your TR 1 step. Add 2 floaters to ANY card.

Lunar Exports.name: Lunar Exports

Lunar Mining.name: Lunar Mining
Lunar Mining.description: Increase your titanium production 1 step for every 2 Earth tags you have in play, including this.

description.text: Requires 2 city tiles in play.

Market Manipulation.name: Market Manipulation

Mining Colony.name: Mining Colony

Minority Refuge.name: Minority Refuge

Molecular Printing.name: Molecular Printing
Molecular Printing.description: Gain 1 M€ for each city tile in play. Gain 1 M€ for each colony in play.

Nitrogen from Titan.name: Nitrogen from Titan

description.text: Requires 3 science tags. Draw 2 cards.

Research Colony.name: Research Colony

Rim Freighters.name: Rim Freighters
Rim Freighters.description: trade_discount Effect: When you trade, you pay 1 less resource for it.

Refugee Camps.name: Refugee Camps
Refugee Camps.description: megacredits production-box Action: Decrease your M€ production 1 step to add a camp resource to this card. 1 VP for each camp resource on this card.

Solar Probe.name: Solar Probe
Solar Probe.description: Draw 1 card for every 3 science tags you have, including this.

Sky Docks.name: Sky Docks

description.text: Requires -6 C. Decrease any plant production 1 step.

description.text: Add two floaters to ANY JOVIAN CARD.

Trade Envoys.description: Effect: When you trade, you may first increase that Colony Tile track 1 step.

Urban Decomposers.name: Urban Decomposers

Aridor.name: Aridor
Aridor.description: You start with 40 M€. As your first action, put an additional Colony Tile of your choice into play

Arklight.name: Arklight

Polyphemos.name: Polyphemos

Poseidon.name: Poseidon

Allied Bank.name: Allied Bank

Aquifer Turbines.name: Aquifer Turbines

Early Settlement.name: Early Settlement

Business Empire.name: Business Empire

Nitrogen Shipment.name: Nitrogen Shipment

Supplier.name: Supplier

Biolab.name: Biolab

Martian Industries.name: Martian Industries

Polar Industries.name: Polar Industries

Society Support.name: Society Support

Galilean Mining.name: Galilean Mining
Galilean Mining.description: Increase your titanium production 2 steps. Pay 5 M€.

Loan.name: Loan

Mohole.name: Mohole
Mohole.description: Increase your heat production 3 steps. Gain 3 heat.

Orbital Construction Yard.name: Orbital Construction Yard

Research Network.name: Research Network

Eccentric Sponsor.name: Eccentric Sponsor

Summit Logistics.name: Summit Logistics

Ceres Tech Market.name: Ceres Tech Market

Colonial Representation.name: Colonial Representation

Nirgal Enterprises.description: You start with 30 M€. Increase your energy, plant, and steel production 1 step each.

Palladin Shipping.name: Palladin Shipping
Palladin Shipping.description: You start with 36 M€. Gain 5 titanium.

Sagitta Frontier Services.name: Sagitta Frontier Services
Sagitta Frontier Services.description: You start with 31 M€. Increase energy production 1 step and M€ production 2 steps. Draw a card that has no tag.

EcoTec.name: EcoTec
EcoTec.description: You start with 42 M€. Increase your plant production 1 step.

Spire.name: Spire
Spire.description: megacredits You start with 50 M€. As your first action, draw 4 cards, then discard 3 cards from your hand. Effect: When you play a card with at least 2 tags. including this, add 1 science resource here. Standard Project megacredits Effect: When you pay for a standard project, science resources here may be used as 2 M€ each.

Atmospheric Enhancers.name: Atmospheric Enhancers
Atmospheric Enhancers.description: Raise temperature 2 steps, or raise oxygen 2 steps, or raise Venus 2 steps. Draw 2 cards with floater icons.

Colony Trade Hub.name: Colony Trade Hub
Colony Trade Hub.description: Increase your energy production 1 step. Gain 2 titanium

Corridors of Power.name: Corridors of Power
Corridors of Power.description: party_leaders Effect: Each time you become party leader, draw 1 card. megacredits Raise your TR 1 step and gain 4 M€

Floating Trade Hub.name: Floating Trade Hub
Floating Trade Hub.description: Action: Add 2 floaters to ANY card. Action: Remove any number of floaters here to gain that many of one standard resource.

Focused Organization.name: Focused Organization
Focused Organization.description: Action: Discard 1 card and spend 1 standard resource to draw 1 card and gain 1 standard resource. Draw 1 card and gain 1 standard resource.

High Circles.name: High Circles
High Circles.description: Raise your TR 1 step and draw 1 card with PARTY REQUIREMENT. Place 2 delegates in one party. Effect: You have +1 influence.

Industrial Complex.name: Industrial Complex
Industrial Complex.description: Lose 18 M€. INCREASE ALL YOUR PRODUCTIONS THAT ARE LOWER THAN 1, TO 1.

Main Belt Asteroids.name: Main Belt Asteroids
Main Belt Asteroids.description: Lose 5 M€. 1 VP per 2 asteroids here.

Nobel Prize.name: Nobel Prize
Nobel Prize.description: Gain 5 M€. Draw 2 cards with requirements.

Old Mining Colony.name: Old Mining Colony
Old Mining Colony.description: Increase your titanium production 1 step. Place 1 colony. Discard 1 card.

Planetary Alliance.name: Planetary Alliance
Planetary Alliance.description: Raise your TR 2 steps. Draw 1 Jovian card and 1 Venus card.

Project Eden.name: Project Eden
Project Eden.description: Place 1 ocean tile, 1 city tile, and 1 greenery tile. Discard 3 cards.

Recession.name: Recession
Recession.description: EACH OPPONENT loses 5 M€ and decreases their M€ production 1 step. You gain 10 M€.

Rise To Power.name: Rise To Power
Rise To Power.description: Increase your M€ production 3 steps and place 3 delegates. YOU MAY PLACE THEM IN SEPARATE PARTIES.

Soil Bacteria.name: Soil Bacteria
Soil Bacteria.description: Draw 2 microbe cards and gain 3 plants.

Terraforming Deal.name: Terraforming Deal
Terraforming Deal.description: megacredits Effect: Each step your TR is raised, you gain 2 M€.

Venus Contract.name: Venus Contract
Venus Contract.description: Draw 1 Venus card. Raise your TR 1 step.

World Government Advisor.name: World Government Advisor
World Government Advisor.description: Raise your TR 2 steps. Draw 1 card.

Aerial Lenses.name: Aerial Lenses
Aerial Lenses.description: Requires that Kelvinists are ruling or that you have 2 delegates there. Remove up to 2 plants from any player. Increase your heat production 2 steps.

Banned Delegate.name: Banned Delegate
Banned Delegate.description: Requires that you are Chairman. Remove any NON-LEADER delegate.

Cultural Metropolis.name: Cultural Metropolis
Cultural Metropolis.description: Requires that Unity is ruling or that you have 2 delegates there. Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your M€ production 3 steps. Place a city tile. Place 2 delegates in 1 party.

Diaspora Movement.name: Diaspora Movement
Diaspora Movement.description: Requires that Reds are ruling or that you have 2 delegates there. Gain 1M€ for each Jovian tag in play, including this.

Event Analysts.name: Event Analysts
Event Analysts.description: Requires that Scientists are ruling or that you have 2 delegates there.

GMO Contract.name: GMO Contract
GMO Contract.description: Requires that Greens are ruling or that you have 2 delegates there.

Martian Media Center.name: Martian Media Center
Martian Media Center.description: Requires that Mars First is ruling or that you have 2 delegates there. Increase your M€ production 2 steps.

Parliament Hall.name: Parliament Hall
Parliament Hall.description: Requires that Mars First are ruling or that you have 2 delegates there. Increase your M€ production 1 step for every 3 building tags you have, including this.

PR Office.name: PR Office
PR Office.description: Requires that Unity are ruling or that you have 2 delegates there. Gain 1 TR. Gain 1 M€ for each Earth tag you have, including this.

Political Alliance.name: Political Alliance
Political Alliance.description: Requires that you have 2 party leaders. Gain 1 TR.

Recruitment.name: Recruitment
Recruitment.description: Exchange one NEUTRAL NON-LEADER delegate with one of your own from the reserve.

Red Tourism Wave.name: Red Tourism Wave
Red Tourism Wave.description: Requires that Reds are ruling or that you have 2 delegates there. Gain 1 M€ from each EMPTY AREA ADJACENT TO YOUR TILES

Sponsored Mohole.name: Sponsored Mohole
Sponsored Mohole.description: Requires that Kelvinists are ruling or that you have 2 delegates there. Increase your heat production 2 steps.

Supported Research.name: Supported Research
Supported Research.description: Requires that Scientists are ruling or that you have 2 delegates there. Draw 2 cards.

Wildlife Dome.name: Wildlife Dome
Wildlife Dome.description: Requires that Greens are ruling or that you have 2 delegates there. Place a greenery tile and raise oxygen 1 step.

Vote Of No Confidence.name: Vote Of No Confidence
Vote Of No Confidence.description: Requires that you have a Party Leader in any party and that the sitting Chairman is neutral. Remove the NEUTRAL Chairman and move your own delegate (from the reserve) there instead. Gain 1 TR.

Pristar.name: Pristar
Pristar.description: You start with 53 M€. Decrease your TR 2 steps. 1 VP per preservation resource here.

Terralabs Research.name: Terralabs Research
Terralabs Research.description: You start with 14 M€. Lower your TR 1 step.

Utopia Invest.name: Utopia Invest
Utopia Invest.description: You start with 40 M€. Increase your steel and titanium production 1 step each.

Septem Tribus.name: Septem Tribus
Septem Tribus.description: You start with 36 M€. When you perform an action, the wild tag counts as any tag of your choice.
